StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruiterByContactCardID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContactCardID uniqueidentifier, @IsOss int
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @RssOss char(1) SET @RssOss = CASE WHEN @IsOSS = 1 THEN 'O' WHEN @IsOss = 0 THEN 'E' END
SELECT TOP 1 RTrim(rp.Rank_Code) as RankCode, RTrim(p.Last_Name) as LastName, RTrim(p.First_Name) as FirstName, RTrim(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME) as MiddleName, rp.rowguid as RecruiterID FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].ContactCard cc INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip msz ON SUBSTRING(cc.Work_ZipCode,1,5) = msz.Zip INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector ms ON msz.SectorID = ms.SectorID AND ms.SectorType = @RssOss INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter msr ON msz.SectorID = msr.SectorID INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson rp ON msr.Recrui.ngPersonId = rp.rowguid INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[PERSON] p ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID
WHERE cc.ID = @ContactCardID
ORDER BY MSR.LastUpdateDate DESC
END
